column1: Every country is supposed to do what’s best for its people, whether it’s China, US, Singapore, and so on #coronavirus Its about time that we do what’s best for the Philippines. This is a very serious matter, to sir Teddy @teddyboylocsin Sen @SAPBongGo Mr President @RRD_Davao
Thank you Dr Edsel Salvana for this PH Update on #COVID19 #CoronaVirusUpdates
All we need to do is STOP..LOOK..LISTEN bcuz' coronavirus is NO JOKE!! #CoronavirusOutbreak #CoronavirusPandemic
